sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez suivre les tendances du marché.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please pay attention to market trends.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Guāng shuō bù dòngshǒu shì méiyòng de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Parler sans agir ne sert à rien.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Just talking without taking action is useless.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 科学家在研究中取得了突破。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Kēxuéjiā zài yánjiū zhōng qǔdé le tūpò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les scientifiques ont fait une percée dans leurs recherches.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Scientists made a breakthrough in their research.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai perdu mes clés.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I lost my keys.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhuō shàng duī le yī duī wénjiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a une pile de documents sur la table.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There is a pile of documents on the table.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 法官调解了双方的纠纷。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Fǎguān tiáojiě le shuāngfāng de jiūfēn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le juge a résolu le litige entre les deux parties.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The judge mediated the dispute between both parties.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qiáng shàng yǒu yī gè dòng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a un trou dans le mur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There is a hole in the wall.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le tofu est un produit à base de soja courant.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Tofu is a common soy product.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shōudào le yī duǒ méigui huā.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle a reçu une rose.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She received a rose.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La fusée a été lancée avec succès.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The rocket was successfully launched.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La nouvelle chanson sort aujourd'hui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The new song is released today.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a trois enfants.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has three children.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il se cache derrière la porte.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is hiding behind the door.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez scanner le code QR pour payer.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please scan the QR code to pay.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les entreprises doivent respecter les réglementations.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Enterprises must comply with regulations.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'économie est en plein essor.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The economy is thriving.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Prévenir et contrôler la pollution est une priorité urgente.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Preventing and controlling pollution is an urgent priority.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le pays applique l'état de droit.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The country implements a rule of law society.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le stationnement illégal entraîne une amende.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Illegal parking will result in a fine.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez cliquer sur le bouton retour.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please click the return button.
